price: كه سزا وركوې نو خپل بندګان دې دي او كه بخښنه ورته كوې نو بې شكه همدا ته حكمت والا برلاسى يې.
arabic: إِن تُعَذِّبۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ عِبَادُكَۖ وَإِن تَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ فَإِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: in tuʿadhib'hum fa-innahum ʿibāduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
